pnp:ListInstance.Title: Metadata - App Color codes
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This list serves as a centralized repository for managing and storing color codes used within the app, ensuring consistent visual aesthetics and facilitating easy reference and updates to color schemes across different app components.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Metadata - Common Connectors
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This list is a structured repository housing details of various Power App connectors used across applications, serving as a centralized reference point for developers and administrators to ensure uniformity and provide quick access to connector configurations and properties.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Metadata - List UI
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This list encapsulates the structured blueprint delineating the layout, elements, and data to be displayed within the Power App forms. It acts as a foundational reference for the app, ensuring the consistent representation of data and interface elements. Utilized dynamically by the Power App, it aids in maintaining uniformity and adherence to design principles across various forms and interface components.

View.Name: {30D35F73-201E-4FE7-9E8F-C5A8E66699C2}
View.Url: {site}/Lists/Metadata List UI/All Items Grouped by Type.aspx

Field.Name: ui_choices
Field.Title: ui_choices

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Metadata - Request IDs
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This list serves as a centralized registry for tracking the last used request ID in the Power App. It is pivotal for generating new, unique request IDs, ensuring each request is distinctly identified and managed within the application, fostering efficient tracking and management of user submissions.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Metadata - Requests workflows
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This list catalogues the various approvals associated with different request types. It acts as a repository for managing and referencing the approval processes necessary for each request, ensuring adherence to organizational protocols and facilitating smooth transitions through the approval stages.

Field.Name: Request_type
Field.Title: Request_type

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Metadata - Screen content
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This SharePoint list houses content items designated to be displayed within the Power App application. It serves as a centralized repository for managing textual and visual elements presented to the users, enabling consistent content delivery and ease of content updates, ensuring users receive accurate and up-to-date information while interacting with the app.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Request - App deletion
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This list serves as the repository for all items pertaining to app deletion requests within the organization. It consolidates the necessary information, status, and documentation related to each deletion request, ensuring systematic processing and tracking of app removals, and providing a structured overview of all deletion endeavors undertaken within the Power App environment.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Request - App deployment
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This list constitutes a centralized repository for all app deployment requests submitted within the organization. It assembles essential details, status updates, and relevant documentation for each deployment request, facilitating a streamlined, organized approach to managing and tracking the rollout of new apps within the Power App ecosystem.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Request - Environment creation
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This list serves as the centralized repository for all environment creation requests within the Power Platform, housing vital details and statuses for each submission. It is instrumental in managing, tracking, and organizing the inception of new environments, ensuring efficient handling and adherence to organizational policies and guidelines.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Request - Environment deletion
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This list acts as the collective repository for all requests related to environment deletion within the Power Platform. It maintains essential details and statuses of each request, facilitating structured management, and tracking of the environment deletion processes, thereby assuring compliance with organizational norms and procedures.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Request - Group creation
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This list serves as the centralized storage for all user-submitted requests related to the creation of Microsoft 365 groups. It captures critical details and states of every request, enabling streamlined management and monitoring of the group creation workflows. It ensures adherence to organizational guidelines and user specifications, effectively aiding in precise and organized formation of groups within Microsoft 365.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Request - Group deletion
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This list acts as the centralized repository for all requests concerning the removal of Microsoft 365 groups. It records essential details and statuses for each deletion request, facilitating organized management and tracking of group removal processes. The list ensures compliance with organizational policies and guidelines while streamlining the group deletion workflow.
